how do I print a page in b/w on a colour: how do I print a page in b/w on a colour printer?
what kind of printer?
: HP Deskjet 3550
: any idea?
not on that particular model, but on the Z22 I use on my lan here, I just opened the print admin and right-clicked to properties, then clicked on Advanced and there was an open to change to b/w
System > Administration > Printing
right-click printer > Properties
then check to see if there's an Advanced tab
: yes, I didn't think of that. Thanks!

double click on New printer, then set the name to be something unique, like HP_ModNum_BW.....
then make that one set by default to B/W
then make sure to set your other to color and remember which one you're spooling to when you send the pdf...;)
